description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Manage all daily operation of Finance & Accounting Department
              
              -	Risk management
              
              -	Budget management
              
              -	Internal work flow management and innovation
              
              -	Monitor and control all accounting policies and procedures to ensure internal control
              
              -	Deal with tax department and related governmental authorities
              
              -	Manage cash flow and working capital
              
              -	Maintain and supervise the accounting workbooks and databases
              
              -	Prepare financial reports to headquarter
              
              -	Subordinate coaching and training
              
              -	Report: CFO (Japanese)
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	At least 05 years in finance and accounting field FMCG company
              
              -	At least 2 years at the same position
              
              -	Tax inspection, tax audit experience
              
              -	Familiar with IFRS, VAS and some accounting system such as SAP, Oracle, MS Navision
              
              -	BA degree in Finance/Accounting
              
              -	Fluent in English
              
              -	Skills: leadership, negotiation, cross-functional communication,
              
              -	Attitude: be honest, reliable, confident and willing to work in high pressure environment
              

              Benefits: 	SHUI, Heath care, company trip, training, salary increase, reward, allowance,…
              

              Preferred language for applications : English, Japanese
              

              Work Place : 17th Floor, Green Power Tower, 35 Ton Duc Thang Street, Ben Nghe Ward,  District 1
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
